General.Name: Nang Kuang Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Nang Kuang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. operates as a pharmaceutical company primarily in Taiwan. The company provides parenterals, aseptic parenterals, lyophilized injections, pre-filled syringes, and pre-mixed IV infusion bags, as well as tablets, capsules, topical products, and oral suspensions. It offers various products in the areas of cardiovascular system, gastrointestinal system, nervous system, alimentary and metabolism, blood, antineoplastic and immunomodulatory, musculo-skeletal system, respiratory system, dermatological, genito-urinary and sex hormone, systemic hormone, systemic antibacterial, and cosmetics, as well as hospital solution. In addition, the company offers sterile, anticancer injectable, injectable controlled and oral controlled products, and oral disintegration tablets. Nang Kuang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1001, Zhongshan Road, Tainan City, Taiwan
